name: Garbodor
description: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.

attacks.name: Trash Cyclone
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each Pokémon Tool card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Poison Spray
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
